name: Chaos Magic
description:
You have been banished to the deadlands and are being hunted at every angle. Drain the essence of demons to survive and become the greatest chaos magician of all time!

Controls:

WASD to move

Click to shoot

Instructions:

Find all the demons and kill them

Preserve your health to stay alive

Ensure that you have enough mana left to cast spells (Minimum 2)

Download:

1. Download the file

2. Extract the zipped file

3. Double-click the application

4. Enjoy!
